room_title: Escape room "Apartment A" by Murfreesboro Escape Room in Murfreesboro
room_description:
Adam loved escape rooms and creating this room is considered to be the best way to honor him. 

In a traditional escape room the story or theme would carry the flow of the room. However, the room creators took it upon themselves to simply create a permanent space in Murfreesboro Escape Rooms filled with puzzles that focus around the things he was passionate about; namely cooking, photography and board games.

In Adam's honor you and your team are challenged to a fun family-oriented challenge, an escape room inspired by a great friend designed to deepen the friendships of all who play Apartment A.
